name: JMeter Test Pipeline

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]     # Trigger on PR

  workflow_dispatch:        # Manual trigger from UI
    inputs:
      testfile:
        description: "JMeter test file to run"
        required: false
        default: "JmeterDemo.jmx"

  schedule:                 # Scheduled trigger (runs every day at 4 AM UTC)
    - cron: "0 4 * * *"

jobs:
  run-jmeter:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      # Step 1 - Checkout repo
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # Step 2 - Install Java
      - name: Set up Java
        uses: actions/setup-java@v3
        with:
          distribution: 'temurin'
          java-version: '11'

      # Step 3 - Install JMeter
      - name: Install JMeter
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y wget unzip
          wget https://downloads.apache.org/jmeter/binaries/apache-jmeter-5.6.3.tgz
          tar -xzf apache-jmeter-5.6.3.tgz
          mv apache-jmeter-5.6.3 jmeter

      # Step 4 - Run JMeter test
      - name: Run JMeter Script
        run: |
          ./jmeter/bin/jmeter -n -t ${{ github.event.inputs.testfile || 'JmeterDemo.jmx' }} -l results.jtl -e -o html-report

      # Step 5 - Upload HTML Report
      - name: Upload JMeter Report
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: jmeter-report
          path: html-report
